title: 2022 Volkswagen ID. Buzz: Feelin’ Groovy
sub_head: VW’s all-electric minibus, arriving in Europe later this year, is as dreamy as Dan Neil hoped—making the wait for a U.S. version (due 2024) all the more agonizing
body:
THE DUNNING-KRUGER EFFECT is a pernicious force in our society. I know all about it.
It is a cognitive bias whereby people assume an expertise in a complex subject they do not understand while gainsaying the judgment of those who do.
